= `tagToElseIfPHP` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [elseSyntax else] > [tagToElseIfPHPMethod tagToElseIfPHP]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$code* _string_
  Valid PHP condition code


Replaces selected tag with PHP "else if" statement containing $code as condition.


Method doesn't change selected elements stack. Returned is source element,  detached from it's parent.


Example
{{{
 $template`['.else-if']`->tagToElseIfPHP('$foo == 1');

}}}
Source
{{{
 <div class='else-if'><node1/></div>

}}}
Result
{{{
 <?php
 else if ($foo == 1) {
 ?><node1/><?php
 }
 ?>

}}}
----


=== Comments allowed ===
